ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Alchemy tips
ygData.msgSnippet: My husband plays a Shammy and he Grandmastered his alchemy recently by  doing just the recipes for the Clarity X potions.  He says you can get  everything you
ygData.messageBody:
My husband plays a Shammy and he Grandmastered his alchemy recently by doing just the recipes for the Clarity X potions.  He says you can get everything you need on potion merchants pretty cheap with the exception of nodding blue lilies which you can either buy in bazaar, forage on a character that has forage ability or go to Old Sebilis and kill the froggies for them, fairly good drop rate there and probably your best and cheapest bet for getting them.  Hope that helps. :)
 
Silverminx
74 Druid ~ Bristlebane Server
